Malice:

"You all sit around squabbling amongst petty factions and never get anything done.  So either do something about Unicron, Or DIE," Malice said simply.  His face plating seemed to liquify, and receed back into his helmet, leaving a shiny metal skull grinning, with two red glowing eyes.



----- Original Message ----
From: xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...>
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, April 12, 2008 1:03:23 AM
Subject: Re: Black Fortress

Perceptor:

"Dont move"said cooly Perceptor while he aimed towards Malice

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups. com, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@ ...> 
wrote:
>
> Myrmidon stared at the door for a long moment, his optics dark and
> narrow as he listened to the words this intruder said to him. Then 
with
> a nod he touched a button on the side of the door and allowed it to
> slide open. 
> 
> Looking inside the room Myrmidon recrossed his arms over his chest 
as
> he did so. 
> 
> "I am not complacent!" Myrmidon's powerful voice even as its changed
> slightly by the hum of the force shield that is still very much in
> place, still filled the room. Even as he spoke though Murmidon felt 
a
> certain 'rightness' to the words. From what he has seen thus far, no
> one seemed to have that agressive spark. 
> 
> His optics looked over at the crates, at Malice's crouched 
form, "What
> do you and this other Megatron bring that is so different then what 
is
> already here?" Myrmidon grunted, "Battle? War? There is all we can 
find
> several stories above our heads." Myrmidon said, speaking about the
> battle going on outside. "Do you bring honor and power, or just 
chaos?"
> 
> Preston
> (Myrmidon)
> 
> --- Robert Riley <chiyohakuryuu@ ...> wrote:
> 
> > Malice:
> > 
> > Malice cackled from the other side. 
> > 
> > "Change, you fool. Change. You all have become complacent and 
that
> > endangers the future. So we're going to take things into our own
> > hands to save us all!"
> > 
> > 
> > ----- Original Message ----
> > From: Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@ ...>
> > To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups. com
> > Sent: Thursday, April 10, 2008 3:49:43 PM
> > Subject: Re: Black Fortress
> > 
> > OOC: Sorry for taking so long to write, but for some reason your
> > message didn't get to me until today. 
> > 
> > BIC:
> > 
> > Myrmidon stood looking at the door for a long moment, part of him
> > wanting to open the door and jump into the battle that no doubt
> > waited
> > for him on the other side of the door, and yet something else
> > screamed
> > caution at him. Why would someone rush headlong into an enemy 
base,
> > knowing that they would quickly bring to bear all the security
> > measures
> > that had on the intruder.
> > 
> > Pressing button on the control panel beside the room door he 
checked
> > the condition of the room. The result was of course a single
> > occupant,
> > and that the room was totally shielded and powered down. So the 
room
> > that could be an arena for battle was now doubling for a temporary
> > cell. 
> > 
> > "Perceptor" Myrmidon called over the short range intrabase
> > communications, "Report to my location, I believe I have our 
intruder
> > pinned."
> > 
> > As Myrmidon waited went back to staring at the door as he crossed 
his
> > arms over his massive chest, his optics 
narrowing. "DECEPTICON! !" He
> > called through the door to malice, "You were a fool to enter this
> > base.
> > What are you looking for?"
> > 
> > Preston
> > (Myrmidon)
> > 
> > --- Robert Riley <chiyohakuryuu@ yahoo.com> wrote:
> > 
> > > Malice:
> > > 
> > > Hearing and detecting the security measures being implaced to 
keep
> > > him in the room, he could safely change forms. Now in classic 
form,
> > > he lie in wait behind a stack of crates. He drew his swords and
> > > smirked. Now he just had to find Rodimus. Nothing works better 
than
> > > a ghost from the past.
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > ----- Original Message ----
> > > From: Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@ yahoo.com>
> > > To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups. com
> > > Sent: Thursday, April 3, 2008 5:54:33 PM
> > > Subject: Re: Black Fortress
> > > 
> > > With widening optics Myrmidon watched as the would be opponant 
flew
> > > inside the base, some how shooting past the other defenders. 
> > > 
> > > "Fool!" Myrmidon growled. Weather he was talking about the 
intruder
> > > or
> > > the defenders at the door it is difficult to tell. 
> > > 
> > > With a thought Myrmidon shifted form assuming his avian mode and
> > > followed. While he was smaller, about the size of a large 
eagle, he
> > > was
> > > outfitted with boosters amd missile launchers. He fired the 
former
> > as
> > > he pursued Malice into the base as he primed the latter, ready 
for
> > > what
> > > would come next. 
> > > 
> > > As Malice wound his way deeper into the base, Mymidon followed, 
his
> > > sensors taking in the residual heat signature and exaust output.
> > Even
> > > for one without sensors Malice wasn't difficult to follow - the
> > > sounds
> > > of internal defences attempting to capture or kill him was a 
finger
> > > pointing directly at him. 
> > > 
> > > Arriving at the door just after Malice entered his hidey hole 
of a
> > > room, Myrmidon smiled. "Good, you have trapped yourself. There 
are
> > no
> > > other doors here." He nodded as he heard the bulkheads dropping
> > down
> > > in
> > > different part of the base. 
> > > 
> > > "Computer!" Myrmidon crossed his arms over his chest. "Erect a
> > > maximum
> > > strength forceshield around ante cabin 447 and deactivate 
power."
> > > 
> > > ((OOC: Airly, you will have to let me know if that works.))
> > > 
> > > Preston
> > > (Myrmidon)
> > > 
> > > --- xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@ yahoo.com> wrote:
> > > 
> > > > Blackfortress/ Perceptor:
> > > > 
> > > > The black fortress alarms started to rang and warn about the 
> > > > intruder. The internal defences opened fire against Malice 
while 
> > > > heavy doors started to close the corridors in attemp to keep 
the 
> > > > intruder out.
> > > > 
> > > > Perceptor took his weapons and moved at one of the several
> > > corritors.
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups. com, Robert Riley 
<chiyohakuryuu@ ...>
> > > > wrote:
> > > > >
> > > > > Malice:
> > > > > 
> > > > > He sneered as they fell right into his hands. He fired a 
sread
> > of
> > > 
> > > > grenades in the path of the mortars and transaformed in a 
flash. 
> > > > Being a smaller craft, he fired his engines and tilted his 
axis
> > and
> > > 
> > > > flew sideways between the defenders and blasted open the door.
> > > > > 
> > > > > "Later, suckers! have fun with those Maximals, or whatever
> > > they're
> > > > 
> > > > callin themselves these days," he called after them as he flew
> > into
> > > 
> > > > the base and started looking for a hiding spot.
> > > > > 
> > > > > He wound down into the deeper parts of the base and ducked 
into
> > > an 
> > > > out of the way storage room, and hoped five minutes would 
pass 
> > > > uninterrupted as he changed form and tried hacking into the 
door 
> > > > controls to lock it out.
> > > > > 
> > > > > 
> > > > > ----- Original Message ----
> > > > > From: Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@ ...>
> > > > > To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups. com
> > > > > Sent: Thursday, March 27, 2008 5:56:34 PM
> > > > > Subject: Re: Black Fortress
> > > > > 
> > > > > Myrmidon is grazed by the firepower and a dark wounds 
opened on
> > > his
> > > > > armored surface. "Enough of this!!" Myrmidon's voice echoed
> > > across 
> > > > the
> > > > > battle field. With a small thrust of power Myrmidon moved
> > skyward
> > > > as
> > > > > his twin mortar cannon reoriented on Malice, fragmentation
> > shells
> > > > > loaded into place. 
> > > > > 
> > > > > "You want battle? You have it!!" Myrmidon chuckled as twin
> > booms 
> > > > errupt
> > > > > from his cannons as they spew thier payload of shrapnel at
> > > Malice!
> > > > > 
> > > > > Preston
> > > > > (Myrmidon)
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- Robert Riley <chiyohakuryuu@ yahoo.com> wrote:
> > > > > 
> > > > > > Malice:
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Malice dashed back with his rifle drawn, firing a 
continuous
> > > beam
> > > > 
> > > > in
> > > > > > an arc to try to hit as many of them as possible.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > "DO you honestly think me so weak? What would I need with
> > > backup?
> > > > 
> > > > > > Anyone else, would just be in my line of fire!" he shouted
> > > back,
> > > > > > lining up Hydras in his sights and fired a higher power 
shot.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > ----- Original Message ----
> > > > > > From: xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@ yahoo.com>
